verses.verse: And the LORD<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> unto<WH413> Moses,<WH4872> saying,<WH559>

Speak <WH1696> unto<WH413> the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> and say<WH559> unto<WH413> them, When<WH3588> either man<WH376> or<WH176> woman<WH802> shall separate<WH6381> themselves to vow<WH5087> a vow<WH5088> of a Nazarite,<WH5139> to separate<WH5144> themselves unto the LORD: <WH3068>

He shall separate<WH5144> himself from wine<WH4480> <WH3196> and strong drink,<WH7941> and shall drink<WH8354> no<WH3808> vinegar<WH2558> of wine,<WH3196> or vinegar<WH2558> of strong drink,<WH7941> neither<WH3808> shall he drink<WH8354> any<WH3605> liquor<WH4952> of grapes,<WH6025> nor<WH3808> eat<WH398> moist<WH3892> grapes,<WH6025> or dried.<WH3002>

All <WH3605> the days<WH3117> of his separation<WH5145> shall he eat<WH398> nothing<WH3808> <WH4480> <WH3605> that<WH834> is made<WH6213> of the vine<WH3196> tree,<WH4480> <WH1612> from the kernels<WH4480> <WH2785> even to<WH5704> the husk.<WH2085>

All <WH3605> the days<WH3117> of the vow<WH5088> of his separation<WH5145> there shall no<WH3808> razor<WH8593> come<WH5674> upon<WH5921> his head:<WH7218> until<WH5704> the days<WH3117> be fulfilled,<WH4390> in the which<WH834> he separateth<WH5144> himself unto the LORD,<WH3068> he shall be<WH1961> holy,<WH6918> and shall let the locks<WH6545> of the hair<WH8181> of his head<WH7218> grow.<WH1431>
All <WH3605> the days<WH3117> that he separateth<WH5144> himself unto the LORD<WH3068> he shall come<WH935> at<WH5921> no<WH3808> dead<WH4191> body.<WH5315>

He shall not<WH3808> make himself unclean<WH2930> for his father,<WH1> or for his mother,<WH517> for his brother,<WH251> or for his sister,<WH269> when they die:<WH4191> because<WH3588> the consecration<WH5145> of his God<WH430> is upon<WH5921> his head.<WH7218>
All <WH3605> the days<WH3117> of his separation<WH5145> he<WH1931> is holy<WH6918> unto the LORD.<WH3068>

And if<WH3588> any man<WH4191> die<WH4191> very<WH6621> suddenly<WH6597> by<WH5921> him, and he hath defiled<WH2930> the head<WH7218> of his consecration;<WH5145> then he shall shave<WH1548> his head<WH7218> in the day<WH3117> of his cleansing,<WH2893> on the seventh<WH7637> day<WH3117> shall he shave<WH1548> it.

And on the eighth<WH8066> day<WH3117> he shall bring<WH935> two<WH8147> turtles,<WH8449> or<WH176> two<WH8147> young<WH1121> pigeons,<WH3123> to<WH413> the priest,<WH3548> to<WH413> the door<WH6607> of the tabernacle<WH168> of the congregation: <WH4150>

And the priest<WH3548> shall offer<WH6213> the one<WH259> for a sin offering,<WH2403> and the other<WH259> for a burnt offering,<WH5930> and make an atonement<WH3722> for<WH5921> him, for that<WH4480> <WH834> he sinned<WH2398> by<WH5921> the dead,<WH5315> and shall hallow<WH6942> <WH853> his head<WH7218> that same<WH1931> day.<WH3117>

And he shall consecrate<WH5144> unto the LORD<WH3068> <WH853> the days<WH3117> of his separation,<WH5145> and shall bring<WH935> a lamb<WH3532> of the first<WH1121> year<WH8141> for a trespass offering:<WH817> but the days<WH3117> that were before<WH7223> shall be lost,<WH5307> because<WH3588> his separation<WH5145> was defiled.<WH2930>

And this<WH2063> is the law<WH8451> of the Nazarite,<WH5139> when<WH3117> the days<WH3117> of his separation<WH5145> are fulfilled:<WH4390> he shall be brought<WH935> unto<WH413> the door<WH6607> of the tabernacle<WH168> of the congregation: <WH4150>

And he shall offer<WH7126> <WH853> his offering<WH7133> unto the LORD,<WH3068> one<WH259> he lamb<WH3532> of the first<WH1121> year<WH8141> without blemish<WH8549> for a burnt offering,<WH5930> and one<WH259> ewe lamb<WH3535> of the first<WH1323> year<WH8141> without blemish<WH8549> for a sin offering,<WH2403> and one<WH259> ram<WH352> without blemish<WH8549> for peace offerings,<WH8002>

And a basket<WH5536> of unleavened bread,<WH4682> cakes<WH2471> of fine flour<WH5560> mingled<WH1101> with oil,<WH8081> and wafers<WH7550> of unleavened bread<WH4682> anointed<WH4886> with oil,<WH8081> and their meat offering,<WH4503> and their drink offerings.<WH5262>
And the priest<WH3548> shall bring<WH7126> them before<WH6440> the LORD,<WH3068> and shall offer<WH6213> <WH853> his sin offering,<WH2403> and his burnt offering: <WH5930>

And he shall offer<WH6213> the ram<WH352> for a sacrifice<WH2077> of peace offerings<WH8002> unto the LORD,<WH3068> with<WH5921> the basket<WH5536> of unleavened bread:<WH4682> the priest<WH3548> shall offer<WH6213> also<WH853> his meat offering,<WH4503> and his drink offering.<WH5262>

And the Nazarite<WH5139> shall shave<WH1548> <WH853> the head<WH7218> of his separation<WH5145> at the door<WH6607> of the tabernacle<WH168> of the congregation,<WH4150> and shall take<WH3947> <WH853> the hair<WH8181> of the head<WH7218> of his separation,<WH5145> and put<WH5414> it in<WH5921> the fire<WH784> which<WH834> is under<WH8478> the sacrifice<WH2077> of the peace offerings.<WH8002>

And the priest<WH3548> shall take<WH3947> <WH853> the sodden<WH1311> shoulder<WH2220> of<WH4480> the ram,<WH352> and one<WH259> unleavened<WH4682> cake<WH2471> out of<WH4480> the basket,<WH5536> and one<WH259> unleavened<WH4682> wafer,<WH7550> and shall put<WH5414> them upon<WH5921> the hands<WH3709> of the Nazarite,<WH5139> after<WH310> <WH853> the hair of his separation<WH5145> is shaven: <WH1548>

And the priest<WH3548> shall wave<WH5130> them for a wave offering<WH8573> before<WH6440> the LORD:<WH3068> this<WH1931> is holy<WH6944> for the priest,<WH3548> with<WH5921> the wave<WH8573> breast<WH2373> and heave<WH8641> shoulder:<WH7785> and after that<WH310> the Nazarite<WH5139> may drink<WH8354> wine.<WH3196>

This <WH2063> is the law<WH8451> of the Nazarite<WH5139> who<WH834> hath vowed,<WH5087> and of his offering<WH7133> unto the LORD<WH3068> for<WH5921> his separation,<WH5145> beside<WH4480> <WH905> that that<WH834> his hand<WH3027> shall get:<WH5381> according to<WH6310> the vow<WH5088> which<WH834> he vowed,<WH5087> so<WH3651> he must do<WH6213> after<WH5921> the law<WH8451> of his separation.<WH5145>
And the LORD<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> unto<WH413> Moses,<WH4872> saying,<WH559>

Speak <WH1696> unto<WH413> Aaron<WH175> and unto<WH413> his sons,<WH1121> saying,<WH559> On this wise<WH3541> ye shall bless<WH1288> <WH853> the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> saying<WH559> unto them,
The LORD<WH3068> bless<WH1288> thee, and keep<WH8104> thee:
The LORD<WH3068> make his face<WH6440> shine<WH215> upon<WH413> thee, and be gracious<WH2603> unto thee:
The LORD<WH3068> lift up<WH5375> his countenance<WH6440> upon<WH413> thee, and give<WH7760> thee peace.<WH7965>
And they shall put<WH7760> <WH853> my name<WH8034> upon<WH5921> the children<WH1121> of Israel;<WH3478> and I<WH589> will bless<WH1288> them.
